amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that only rental car companies whose primary business is renting vehicles are covered by the new requirements in the Senate passed version of H.R. 22.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 13 printed in Part B of House Report 114-326 to the Senate amendment to the text to clarify that only rental car companies whose primary business is renting vehicles are covered by the new requirements in the Senate passed version of H.R. 22.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Williams amendment (A086) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Williams amendment (A086) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A086) offered by Mr. Williams.
